name: Militibus Elementis: Skies of Galaraya
description:
Thirty years ago Raven, and Keldanite saved the world from ruin. Afterward they decided to turn the Flora Empire into a Alliance with the Darwin Kingdom renaming the continent Flora to Galaraya after Keldanite's sister. They stayed in a Avanna and had a son named Renkujin. When their son turned twenty one he decided to join Lorn Academy to become a knight for Queen Mira of Darwin. He is put in a special high level class that only teaches the best. 

Credits(Also in game)
